metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40307 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.19.8.drivers/firmware/efi/capsule-loader.c has a race condition with a resultantuse-after-free.
